name: Kai Zhao 0008
content: Kai's Homepage Kai Zhao Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science Florida State University Office: 164, Love Building Email: kai.zhao@fsu.edu Google Scholar CV Biography I am a tenure-track Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Florida State University. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California, Riverside, in 2022. Prior to that, I received a B.S. in Computer Science from Peking University in 2014. During my Ph.D. studies, I worked as a student intern at Argonne National Laboratory. My research interests are broadly in high-performance computing and autonomous driving, with a focus on reliability, efficiency, and data management. Positions are available in my lab. Please refer to the Hiring page for more information. FSU is among the top 30 universities in the world in the field of HPC. Research Interests High Performance Computing (HPC) Scientific Data Management, Analytics, and Visualization Fault Tolerance and Resilience in Machine Learning and HPC Large Scale Deep Neural Networks Parallel, Distributed and Heterogeneous Systems
